English: The leader of the haven, Sol "Maker" Markus, is fascinated by the esoteric and the occult. He has requested that we retrieve a Drop-Ka stone that he has located in a Pre-War collection.
French: Le chef du refuge, Sol "Maker" Markus, est fasciné par l’ésotérique et l’occulte. Il a demandé que nous récupérions une pierre Drop-Ka qu’il a localisée dans une collection d’avant-guerre.

English: Sol is happy and reminds us to do as we are told if we want to receive further blessings
French: Sol est heureux et nous rappelle de faire ce qu’on nous dit, si nous voulons recevoir d’autres bénédictions

English: Sol has received the Bionics tech. He hints that Subject 24 should be destroyed.
French: Sol a reçu la technologie bionique. Il suggère que le sujet 24 devrait être détruit.

English: Sol is happy because we destroyed the fortress
French: Sol est heureux parce que nous avons détruit la forteresse

English: Enjoy the sights and pungent smells!
French: Profitez des vues et des odeurs piquantes !
NE JOUER PAS AVEC LA PATIENCE DE SOL
FAITES CE QUE SOL VOUS DEMANDE

English: A haven in the Mist, has succumbed to Pandoran infestation!
French: Un refuge dans la brume, a succombé à l'infestation pandorienne !

English: The valley below is lush, almost primordial. Nature or the old Earth, untarnished by the Pandoravirus. Places like these can still be found on the planet; less than 20 years ago they were covered by water or sediment. The Earth was transformed, washed, dried, swept away, bringing back to sight and life a world hidden a long, long time ago.
We will release a number of short-range drones to map the area and locate the ancient ruins
